title: Prime location! Amazing floorplans at Stonetree Apartments
posting_body: ['Stonetree Apartments', 'Located at: 2414 Stone Rd East Point, GA 30344', 'Featured unit: 1 bed | 1.5 bath | 1000 sq ft', 'Prices start at: $1395 - $1632/month', 'Call Today!', 'show amenities.', 'Residents enjoy our on-site fitness center, sundeck, and lush landscaping.', 'Let us not forget about our apartments themselves, with fully equipped kitchens, spacious closets, washer & dryer connections, and so much more.', 'Wonderful Amenities!', '● 24 Hour Availability', '● Business Center/Clubhouse', "● Children's Playground Area", '● Convenient Online Rental Payments', '● Heart
